Summary: bullet shaped 3 big lights on side orange in back white front two flew low over trees medium speed no noise
divs: Sighting Detailsstanding outside my apartment having a smoke first saw orange glow as object approached from south knew it wasnt a plane much bigger than plane shaped like a spaceship no noise never hovered just passed by lights did not change noticed three huge lights on side orb shaped, went white white orange noticed smaller lights in between some white some orange may have descended slightly as it flew by in awe knowing it was big and not a plane flew directly over my apartment building and i lost sight of it we noticed something else over 635 and 75 two weeks ago this area as we were driving cigarette shaped three small white lights flew over freeway object turned part of itself down like a wing dipping on a plane flew by and did 90 degree turn around a building very quickly and disappeared, no noise dark fuselage bright orange light behind ship like an engine, this object was very different from the other listed above
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around September 2nd 2012
